name: Horrifying Nightmares
description:
WARNING: Sound may possibly loud!

You went to bed and dreamed up a whole nightmare in the month of October. It's your job to make sure you wake up from this bad dream through a few challenges and "ESC" from the horrors of the spooky mobs!

This game was designed for a game jam with the theme: Escape. 

All the programming was done by me. 

Controls:

W- move up

A- move left

S- move down

D- move right

Left click: Shoot scythe weapons

Credits:

Unity: 

Pixel Adventure 1 - Pixel Frog

Crystal World Platformer - Szadi Art

Free Pixel font: Thaleah - Tiny Worlds

Fantasy Wooden GUI - Black Hammer

Medieval pixel art set - BlackSpire

Rogue Fantasy Castle - Szadi Art

Ultra Sci-Fi Game Audio Weapons Pack - Eric Berzins

Casual Game SFX Pack - DUSTYROOM
